title: Transporter 3 font
content:
Hi guys,

Anyone ID this font for me [ the main title and End date board etc?

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGPE\_qfv--Q](http://web.archive.org/web/20130826013949/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGPE_qfv--Q "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGPE\_qfv--Q")

Many thanks
author: Bebop9693

comments.content:
Similar to Bullet from House Industries:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/bullet](http://web.archive.org/web/20130826013949/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/bullet "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/bullet")

Thanks marcox - it is similar. Perhaps it's one they designed specifically for the film?

Anyone else?
